title: nambinEn ayya
sahitya:
nambinEn ayyA nAthA nin pAdam



anupallavi



tunba vElai tIrndu inba vElai Arndu nin pon vElai Orndu anbanEn aruL

shArnduyya



caraNam



durita tApa haraNa suravinuta caraNa varada mA vitaraNa vara vakuLAbharana-

parita sIta kiraNa parishuddhAnta karaNa sarasa kavi kunjaradAsa bharaNa
